admission_text:
[Logged in and already know how to renew your membership? Click here to get started.](https://pacrafts.org/member-account/subscription/)

### How to Renew:

**To renew your membership, login to your account.** Alternatively, you can renew via mail with the renewal reminder we sent over to you. 

If you would prefer to renew manually and/or submit a check for your membership payment, **[please contact us](https://pacrafts.org/contact/)** and we will email a form to you.

##### IMPORTANT Info:

  1. Memberships, also referred to as “subscriptions” may only be renewed for one year.
  2. If your member information (name/address) is correct select “View” and then “Pay Now” to renew your subscription.
  3. If you need to update your name or address, click on the appropriate tab (Account, Password, Billing Address) below prior to renewing.
  4. To renew an expired membership, please log in with your user name and password. You will be directed to your profile page where you will find a link to choose your membership level and confirm your chapter selection, if any. 

[Click here to login to your account and renew your membership](https://pacrafts.org/member-account/subscription/)

_Please note: The word “Subscriptions” appears because of the software the site uses to process member dues._

**Please note that you will be asked for a payment method and will be directed to PayPal who is our payment processor. While it says “Pay with PayPal” you are not required to use a PayPal account ...

### Shop for Fine Handmade Crafts

We represent over 125 artist members of the Pennsylvania Guild of Craftsmen and offer a broad range of both contemporary and traditional fine handmade crafts.
